description:
This session will provide an overview of the architecture and key technologies that are being used in MeeGo, an open source project for platforms including netbooks, handhelds, connected TVs, IVI, slates and media phones. It will cover the MeeGo middleware services for Communication, Internet, Visualization, Media, Data Management, Device Management, Security and Personal information, the MeeGo APIs (including the Qt toolkit), and the Linux kernel and other base OS services. You will also learn about the tools available to develop applications and MeeGo devices, including tools for application power optimization.

   • Sponsored by Intel
title: MeeGo Technical Overview
